channel.itunes:keywords: scrubs, podcast, interview, television, sacred heart
channel.title: Sacred Heart Stories (Scrubs)
channel.itunes:author: Grady's Podcasts
channel.description: Sacred Heart Stories is our podcast all about the television sitcom Scrubs. Featuring interviews with actors from the show!
channel.itunes:summary: Sacred Heart Stories is our podcast all about the television sitcom Scrubs. Featuring interviews with actors from the show!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Sacred Heart Stories is our podcast all about the television sitcom Scrubs. Featuring interviews with actors from the show!

item.title: Shaughn Buchholz (Cabbage)
item.description: Grady sits down with Shaughn Buchholz, who played the lovable doofus Cabbage on the television show Scrubs. They talk about how he got the job on Scrubs, where Cabbage would be now after the show, and the importance of washing your hands so that you don't kill Mrs. Wilk...or spread diseases.

item.title: Bob Clendenin (Dr. Paul Zeltzer)
item.description: Bob Clendenin is a notorious "that guy" that has appeared in 100's of television shows, movies, and commercials. Grady talks to Bob about his role on Scrubs as the creepy Dr. Paul Zeltzer, what it is like working with Bill Lawrence, and playing a guessing game of "Which show do they know me from?".
